title: Understanding Table Expansion
text: When you enter data in rows or columns adjacent to a table, Excel automatically expands the table to include the new data. This feature helps maintain the table's structure and ensures that all data is part of the table.

title: Table Functionality
text: The table feature in Excel is designed to automatically include new data entered in adjacent rows or columns. This ensures that any formulas, formatting, or data validation rules applied to the table are also applied to the new data.

title: Confirming Table Expansion
text: Does entering data in rows or columns adjacent to the table automatically make it part of the table?
choices: yes, when you apply the table function
yes, but only if you hold and drag the table
